trans-unit.source: Provides access to state pertinent to all HTTP modules relevant to federated authentication in the web application.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso ao estado pertinente a todos os módulos HTTP relevantes para autenticação federada no aplicativo web.

trans-unit.source: Gets the claims authorization module used by the web application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o módulo de autorização de declarações usado pelo aplicativo web.
O módulo de autorização de declarações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the singleton <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> instance used by the HTTP modules in this web application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o singleton <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> instância usada pelos módulos HTTP neste aplicativo web.
A instância de configuração de Federação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> by an event handler for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> por um manipulador de eventos para o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration*> property is accessed for the first time by one of the HTTP modules in the web application.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration*>propriedade é acessada pela primeira vez por um dos módulos HTTP no aplicativo web.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration*>

trans-unit.source: The FederationConfigurationCreated event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O evento FederationConfigurationCreated é gerado quando o módulo HTTP do primeiro no aplicativo web referencia <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from the [\<federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md) element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro acesso da propriedade faz com que um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto ser criado e inicializado do [ \< federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md) elemento no arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it before it is used to provide initialization for any of the HTTP modules configured for the application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o recém-criado <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto por meio de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em um manipulador de eventos para examinar ou modificá-lo antes de ser usada para fornecer a inicialização para qualquer um dos módulos HTTP configurados para o aplicativo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: Gets the session authentication module (SAM) used by the web application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o módulo de autenticação de sessão (SAM) usado pelo aplicativo web.
O módulo de autenticação de sessão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) used by the web application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o módulo de autenticação de WS-Federation (WSFAM) usado pelo aplicativo web.
O módulo de autenticação do WS-Federation.
